alert.note: Alert for Benton; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Benton and northeastern Washington Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 230 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Decatur, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Springdale... Rogers... Bentonville... Bella Vista... Lowell... Farmington... Gentry... Elkins... Tontitown... Gravette... West Fork... Cave Springs... Decatur... Greenland... Highfill... Springtown... Northwest Arkansas Regional Air... Hiwasse... Drake Field Airport... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 55 and 86. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for northeastern Oklahoma.
